settings.title: Network Types
settings.directionsTextVer: Match the network types to their correct definition, then check your answers below.
settings.innerDirections: Select a term on the left, then select the definition that you think matches it.
settings.completeTxt: Your brain is making connections left and right. Excellent job matching the terms to their correct definition.
settings.failText: Trying is like CrossFit for the brain! Review the terms in this lesson and try matching the words to their correct definition.

items.right: typically seen in universities and office buildings
limited to a small area such as an office building, university, or a home
provides access to data storage, so that storage devices can communicate with computers and other devices
a broad area (like across metropolitan, regional, or national boundaries) using private or public networks
LAN that is used without cables
